    Make Database Breakdown Dataframe V2

    makeDFdatabaseBreakdown_2.Rd

    Make Database Breakdown Dataframe V2

    makeDFdatabaseBreakdown_2(DB, interval, lastMonth, total_seqs, total_seqs_1m)

    Arguments

    DB

    File path to subset database file. In the case of making summary tables, we use the 3M version from CoMIT, returned from pull_subset_DB()

    interval

    string describing the first period analyzed, which is a 3-month period, e.g. May - July 2022

    lastMonth

    string describing the second period analyzed, which is a 1-month period, e.g. July 2022

    total_seqs

    total number of sequences for the 3-month period

    total_seqs_1m

    total number of sequences for the 1-month period

    Value

    combined_df, a dataframe with data for both time periods and all needed formatting applied for creation of the gt table

    Contents

    Developed by Ashlie Stephenson.
